entry.title: Midnight Oil
entry.summary:
Author: JHawk23

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,954Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 46

Summary: “Can’t sleep?” Jason mumbled.“Nope,” Dick eased the door closed, tossed his limp stuffed elephant to Jason like a football, and flopped onto the mattress. “Noticed you stopped your moaning and groaning a few hours ago, so I figured you were awake too.”“You’d think a fancy house like this would have thicker walls.”“Mini-NP?” Dick asked. “All rules apply.”Jason wasn’t sure when this had started to become a ‘thing.’ Probably before he came home, but that was privileged information. Nightmare Piles were like Fight Club. Rule one: no one talked about it afterwards. The stuff they talked about… if they talked… was absolutely privileged. No sharing it with anyone else in the family. No using it against the sharer. Jason added that one.Physical contact was a must. That was a Dick rule. Jason tended to think of it as mutually assured destruction. More realistically it was Dick reminding himself that all his siblings were, in fact, alive. But they kept it up, even if Dick wasn’t there.Just me using my comfort characters as my own personal therapy avatars. No plot. Just conversations. A bit of fluff. Nonsense

entry.title: Your Love Is So (Hurt) Heartful
entry.summary:
Author: Ocyus_Stuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,684Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 92

Summary: Your father’s child body should not have been covered in bruises and broken bones.His youngest brother brought little Bruce’s hand up, resting his forehead against the back of B’s hands. “You were supposed to be safe”, he growled into Bruce’s hand. He emphasised the word safe, spat the word out with so much offense that as if with enough strength, Damian could will his wish into existence and rewrite this cruel moment of Bruce’s past and morph it into something kinder, something more befitting for a man who will spend the rest of his adulthood covered in the same kind bruises and walk the earth with bones broken ten, twenty times over from protecting a city that bites the hands that try to hold it with even the slightest hint of kindness and later, from protecting the whole world with the strength of his heart and the wit of his mind as his greatest weapon.“You were supposed to be l—" Damian’s breath hitched, and it was a terrible sound.Loved. Dick finished in his heart. You were supposed to be loved.

entry.title: Your Beauty Is That of Gentle Winter, My Dearest
entry.summary:
Author: Ocyus_Stuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,983Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 573

Summary: She remembers Bruce’s face - haunted and resigned with steel in his eyes. A flicker of Batman in the mild posture of Bruce Wayne. And how Stephanie wanted to give those old bags the verbal beatdown of a lifetime, but Bruce put a hand on her back and steered them away from the crowd. “It’s not worth it,” he said. He barreled on when he saw Stephanie open her mouth, a retort already shaping on the tip of her tongue. “I’m used to it. I don’t want them to drag you into this”. As if they already don’t - Bruce Wayne and all of his charity cases.“You’re so pretty, you know?” she suddenly starts. Bruce slowly blinks, the way he does at the rare instance that something is confusing him and his brain can’t catch up fast enough to come up with a solution. “Come on, Jason. Back me up here”.Jason sighs. “Your so fucking pretty it makes me wanna vomit”. He turns away, hiding his face behind his hand, but she can still spot the hint of redness on the tip of his ears.orAn asshole slutshames Bruce Wayne at a gala, earning Stephnaie's ire. The old man won't do anything about it, but Stephanie will. She'll enhance his beauty, make him beautiful, unattainable - a true prince

entry.summary:
Author: hattersrabbit

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,186Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 25

Summary: "I hurt you again! I let another being cloud my mind, and I hurt you again-"Gloved hands with the sharpest of nails graze the aliens skin. entry.title: Operation: Friend the Bat
entry.summary:
Author: SamLikesToRead

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,264Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 99

Summary: Batman saved the Justice League by roasting them alive and resigning with zero fanfare. Now the team's falling apart, crying over monitor duty, and writing 10,000-word apology emails.Meanwhile, Batman's baking cupcakes in Gotham and pretending not to miss them. (He totally does.)Also, surprise—he’s been the Watchtower’s secret baker this whole time.Cue chaos, tears, and one very emotional group hug.

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheLastWord

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,578Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 305

Summary: “I think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,” Bruce said, voice carefully neutral. When a mysterious device sends the Batkids' future sons and daughters to the past, right in the middle of the cave, none of them is ready. Not the new kids, whose family as they know it is back in a different time, and certainly not Bruce's own children, too young to be parents.With the six now stuck in a time in which they don't exist yet, hurt by a future that will never be, the Batkids will have to decide what it truly means to be a family and how to face the ghosts of choices not yet taken.AKAThe Batkids meet their future children and everything gets complicated.- - - -Part of a series dedicated to the Batkids' kids, this is a STAND-ALONE fic.

entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,506Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 272

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: The Kiss of Revelation
entry.summary:
Author: SamLikesToRead

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,055Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 205

Summary: Bruce Wayne never wanted to reveal his identity to the Justice League. But when his kids confront him about his chronic emotional repression, he makes a bet: he’ll reveal who he is — without saying a word. The result? One incredibly awkward, absolutely unforgettable kiss that rocks the Watchtower and emotionally destabilizes half the League. (Featuring: unhinged Batkids, a traumatized Justice League, and Batman weaponizing intimacy.)

entry.title: To be a hero
entry.summary:
Author: Savage_vigilante

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,524Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Being a hero doesn’t always mean taking down the bad guys or saving the world. Sometimes being a hero means helping people when they need it the most, and the bat family is no exception.This is a collection of one shots, following different members of the bat family as they try in their own ways to put a little good in the world.

entry.title: Operation: Get Dad a Life (and Accidentally a League of Lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: SamLikesToRead

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,855Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 237

Summary: The Justice League thinks they’re dating Batman.The Batfamily thinks they’re just setting Bruce up with new friends.Bruce thinks he’s having a mental breakdown.One global crisis, several accidental dates, and many overheard “Dad”s later, everyone slowly realizes they’re in love.(Except Bruce. He realizes last.)A chaotic love story starring oblivious bats, nosy kids, and one very confused League.
